Package com.github.moribund.graphics.animations

Classes related to animations are here.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationContainer
    The AnimationContainer class contains SpriteAnimations.
    SpriteAnimation
    A custom class for an Animation that keeps track of if the animation is currently playing and allows for post-runnable actions when an animation finished.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Animation
    An animation as an ID that is related to its respective animation file.
    AnimationFile
    The AnimationFile points to the TextureAtlas location of an animation.

Package com.github.moribund.graphics.animations Description

Classes related to animations are here. This includes the class for animations itself (SpriteAnimation).
